abstract: Cisco Systems may be gearing up for some big plays, according to BusinessWeek. In an effort to increase growth at the networking company, Ned Hooper, who heads up business development, which includes mergers and acquisitions as well as venture capital investments, is looking to make bigger-and potentially riskier-acquisitions than the company has ever done before, according to the magazine.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems may be gearing up for some big plays, according to BusinessWeek. In an effort to increase growth at the networking company, Ned Hooper, who heads up business development, which includes mergers and acquisitions as well as venture capital investments, is looking to make bigger-and potentially riskier-acquisitions than the company has ever done before, according to the magazine.

headline.main: Cisco May Be Stalking Big Game
